title: INsmh
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Man plans to use World War II bomb found in his garden as beer cooler
items.description: The bomb's discovery lead to Ross' street being shut with an explosive ordnance disposal unit ensured the device was safe.

items.title: Woman paralysed from neck down after weight loss surgery in Turkey
items.description: Danielle Peebles started getting complications from her surgery shortly after she returned from Turkey.

items.title: Student so scared of DIY he paid tradesman £180 to change batteries
items.description: Sam Daley also says he doesn’t want to speak to anyone on the phone and he lacks the confidence to negotiate so sourced the tradesman through an app.

items.title: Nine English words you probably didn’t know came from Irish
items.description: Some common words we use every day, including the name of one of the UK's main political parties, have a surprising origin in Irish.

items.title: Man claims he was shot by his dog while lying in bed
